trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja fears the dimming of the lights.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Ankledeep)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Ankledeep)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Ankledeep)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>So does Gok Golma spend yet another day bathed in golden light... Ever since the Boonewa mages worked their magicks, the crops have never looked healthier.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>If I recall, it was you who procured the energy-rich vessels that helped make the lights a possibility in the first place.

TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>Aside from the power provided by the base vessel, however, it seems the spell also requires a consumable catalyst to sustain its effect. As such, I must once again call upon your gathering expertise.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>And thanks to the spell catalyst you so kindly acquired, the illumination over the gainery remains undimmed...for the moment.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>Unfortunately, no source of energy lasts forever. If you're willing to lend a hand, the time has come to replenish our stocks.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>The ice crystals mined around the area of Ankledeep should be sufficient for our needs. The purer, the better.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_008<tab>The water crystals found in the area of Ankledeep should be sufficient for our needs. The purer, the better.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_009<tab>The crystalfish caught in Ankledeep should be sufficient for our needs. I imagine you have some golden stonefly nymphs left over for bait.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Please head to Ankledeep and dig up the purest ice crystals you can find.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>Please head to Ankledeep and gather the purest water crystals you can find.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>Please head to Ankledeep with a pocketful of golden stonefly nymphs, and see if you can land us a sizable crystalfish.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Heh...you have the look of a person who's found exactly what they were looking for.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_016<tab>Yes, our lights should shine all the brighter with such a dazzling source of energy.
TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_017<tab>I cannot overstate the beneficial effects of the illumination, especially given the way our vegetables have thrived beneath its glow...

TEXT_BANMAM124_05284_KAGEELJA_000_018<tab>We've seen steady increases in both yield and variety of crops, which means a more bountiful dinner table for everyone in Mamook! Your contributions, past, present, and future, are most appreciated.
